sentences.sContent: Stale. Lack of bouquet and freshness of a wine through too much aeration or infection with film yeasts.
sentences.sContent_eng: Stale. Lack of bouquet and freshness of a wine through too much aeration or infection with film yeasts.
sentences.sCn: 走味的、沉滞的：由于通风过度或受产膜酵母的侵染，葡萄酒变得缺乏香气及新鲜爽口感。

phrases.pCn: 饱气带；含气层；曝气区；通气带

remMethod.val: aer(空气) + ation → 能通空气 → 通风

words.tran: 充气的；充入二氧化碳的；同空气混合的
充气，让空气进入（areate的过去分词形式）；使暴露在空气中
充气；让空气进入；使暴露于空气中
